hooks.command: echo '=== Claude Code Session Started ===' && date && echo 'Working directory:' $(pwd) && if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); echo "Git branch: $BRANCH"; if [[ "$BRANCH" != "main" && "$BRANCH" != "master" && "$BRANCH" != "unknown" ]]; then BEHIND=$(git rev-list --count $BRANCH..main 2>/dev/null || git rev-list --count $BRANCH..master 2>/dev/null || echo '0'); if [ "$BEHIND" -gt 0 ]; then echo "âš ï¸  Branch is $BEHIND commits behind main - consider running: sync-feature-branch"; fi; fi; fi && if [ -f "$HOME/.claude/scripts/check-dotclaude.sh" ]; then bash "$HOME/.claude/scripts/check-dotclaude.sh"; fi

if echo "$TOOL_USE_ARGS" | grep -q 'git checkout main\|git checkout master\|git pull'; then if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'ðŸ’¡ Tip: Feature branches may be behind main. Run sync-feature-branch to check.'; fi; fi
